column1: Smoque BBQ////The place is a dive
column2: you'd drive by and miss it unless your windows were down and you smelled the smoke.  It was packed
column3: so you know people are coming back.  We might try it again and order the chicken.  But in my humble opinion
column4: while I enjoy a good smokey flavor to my BBQ
column5: I also want to taste the food.  Ribs were a fail on that account.  But I enjoyed the hell out of my pork sandwich so
